Posted By: Treima (5/16/2010 5:27:48 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
[Ravenous Baloth](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ravenous Baloth) in [Garruk](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Garruk)'s deck? Hell yes!  
4x4 medicine is back with the new card design and the old remarkable artwork.  
This along with [Wirewood Savage](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Wirewood Savage) gives the deck a notable tribal aspect, given that besides Garruk's tokens you get a lot other beasts ([Blastoderm](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Blastoderm), [Krosan Tusker](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Krosan Tusker), [Beast Attack](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Beast Attack), [Stampeding Wildebeests](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Stampeding Wildebeests) and [Indrik Stomphowler](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Indrik Stomphowler)), too.
posts.html:
Ravenous Baloth in Garruk's deck? Hell yes!
4x4 medicine is back with the new card design and the old remarkable artwork.
This along with Wirewood Savage gives the deck a notable tribal aspect, given that besides Garruk's tokens you get a lot other beasts (Blastoderm, Krosan Tusker, Beast Attack, Stampeding Wildebeests and Indrik Stomphowler), too.

Posted By: desolation_masticore (5/25/2011 8:04:22 AM)

posts.post_content:
You can sacrifice itself for 4 life. Also, this is good for [Rampaging Baloths](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Rampaging Baloths)' landfall effect.  
  
If the battlefield is going to get wiped out by [Day of Judgment](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Day of Judgment) or similar, you can sack all your beasts, including itself, to get life. Don't forget that Felidar Sovereign is a beast subtype.
posts.html:
You can sacrifice itself for 4 life. Also, this is good for Rampaging Baloths' landfall effect.

If the battlefield is going to get wiped out by Day of Judgment or similar, you can sack all your beasts, including itself, to get life. Don't forget that Felidar Sovereign is a beast subtype.

posts.post_content:
Turns every beast you got into a Brindle Bore? HELL YES!  
@desolation masticore Do that each turn with [Fresh Meat](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Fresh Meat) Imprinted on a [Panoptic Mirror](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Panoptic Mirror). Then sacrifice the tokens with this, and you're getting at least 4 life extra per turn. If you sacked more you'd get more.
